description: Two sheep ride a ski lift up a snowy mountain towards a lodge. Above the lodge, a massive avalanche is cascading down, emitting loud rumbling sounds. One sheep, mistaking the sound of the avalanche, asks if it is the other's stomach rumbling. This juxtaposition of mundane bodily sounds with the terrifying reality of an avalanche creates a darkly humorous and absurd situation.
caption: “My stomach? ... Your stomach’s rumbling!”
